name: Zamna India | Mumbai
about: ZAMNA India is back, bringing the enchanting vibes of Tulum to Mumbai for another unforgettable festival. This year’s lineup features renowned artists like Adriatique, Brina Knauss, Toto Chiavetta, and the dynamic duo Bigfett B2B Wurtz, promising an electrifying night of deep house, techno, and genre-blending beats. Join the celebration curated by District by Zomato, Paradox, and WMS Entertainment, where every moment is a journey through

name: SHIMZA live Presented by Sunburn Union
about: Join us in Bangalore for an unforgettable night with Shimza, one of Africa's top DJs and producers, as he brings the Afro House vibe to life. Known for his mesmerizing beats and seamless transitions, Shimza is set to elevate the electronic music scene. Don’t miss the exclusive offer of 1+1 on all liquor from 5 PM to 7 PM.

name: Martin Garrix - World's Biggest Holi Party
about: Experience the ultimate Holi celebration as Martin Garrix takes the stage at DY Patil Stadium on March 14, 2025. Join thousands of fans for an electrifying night filled with vibrant colors, unforgettable beats, and stunning visuals, all set to Garrix's iconic tracks. This is not just a concert; it's a historic celebration of music and unity you won't want to miss.

name: Nitefreak Live at Mirage
about: Join the world-renowned Afro-House sensation, NITEFREAK, at Mirage, Bangalore's premier rooftop club. Experience an unforgettable night filled with mesmerizing beats and stunning skyline views. Limited spots available, so secure your place for this epic event.

name: Paresh Pahuja The Voice Notes Concert
about: Join Paresh Pahuja and Friends for an enchanting evening of poetry, music, and storytelling in The Voice Notes India Tour. Known for his role as Mahi in Bandish Bandits, Paresh merges his talents as a singer-songwriter and composer, delivering heartfelt performances that blend pop, indie rock, and Bollywood influences. Secure your seats for this intimate auditorium show and immerse yourself in a celebration of artistic brilliance.

name: Tiësto India Tour 2025 | Bengaluru
about: Tiësto, the Godfather of EDM, is set to light up Bengaluru on February 16, 2025, as he wraps up his India tour. Prepare for an unforgettable night filled with electrifying beats, stunning visuals, and hits like "The Business" and "Don’t Be Shy." Don't miss this chance to experience the magic of Tiësto live in concert!

name: Kavya + Mali Live at the Warehouse #04
about: Join us for an unforgettable night at Live at the Warehouse, featuring the incredible talents of KAVYA and Mali. KAVYA, a New Delhi producer and songwriter, brings her emotionally charged audio-visual project that delves into her cultural roots and the theme of “rituals.” Meanwhile, Mumbai's Mali, known for her critically acclaimed debut album ‘Caution to the Wind,’ will captivate you with her unique blend of classic pop and contemporary sounds. Don't miss this chance to experience the

name: One Night, One Love with Vasu Raina
about: Experience an enchanting Valentine's Day at The Yard with Delhi's own Vasu Raina. Known for his soulful Hindi and Urdu melodies, Vasu's heartfelt lyrics and captivating performances promise an unforgettable night filled with emotion and magic. Whether you're celebrating love or enjoying your own company, let the music create lasting memories.

name: Giorgia Angiuli Live at Sunburn Union
about: Get ready for an unforgettable night with Giorgia Angiuli on February 8th at Sunburn Union! This Italian sensation fuses classical training with innovative electronic beats, delivering a live performance filled with dreamy vocals and unique toy instruments. Join us for an electrifying set that will seamlessly blend pop, techno, and house, and experience the magic that has captivated audiences worldwide.

name: SoMAD Y2K - A Early 2000s Throwback Party  | Barbie's 66th Anniversary Edition at Daddy Indiranagar Bengaluru
about: Join us for a nostalgic 2000s throwback party celebrating Barbie's 66th anniversary! Dance to iconic hits from *NSYNC, Britney Spears, and more, while showing off your best Barbie-inspired outfits. Get ready for a night of fun at Daddy, the hottest bar in town!

name: Ghost-Note - Live at Fandom
about: Experience an electrifying night with Ghost-Note, the dynamic duo of Robert 'Sput' Searight and Nate Werth from Snarky Puppy. Blending funk with afrobeats, hip-hop, and psychedelia, their live performance promises infectious grooves and a vibrant atmosphere, showcasing tracks from their latest album, Mustard n' Onions. Don't miss this chance to witness a musical evolution rooted in the legends of funk.

name: Valentines Special Armaan Malik Live in Bangalore
about: Join us for Armaan Malik's first-ever Valentine Special concert, a night filled with his enchanting melodies. Experience the magic of this multilingual sensation behind hits like "Chale Aana" and "Butta Bomma," as he captivates the audience with his smooth voice and impressive global achievements. Don't miss this unforgettable celebration of love and music.

name: Ext Presents Altinbas, Dotdat & Gigi Fm
about: Join us on February 19th for an unforgettable night at EXT featuring Altinbas, GiGi FM, and DotDat. Experience the innovative sounds of these three visionary artists as they redefine the techno scene with their immersive sets and boundary-pushing productions. Get ready to dance and lose yourself in a sonic journey that promises to resonate with your body, mind, and soul.

name: Elijah Fox | Bangalore
about: Join us for an unforgettable night with Elijah Fox, a genre-defying multi-instrumentalist and producer whose captivating sound blends jazz, Impressionism, and psychedelic soul. Experience his dynamic performances and hit compositions, including the viral sensation "Wyoming," as he takes the stage to showcase his artistic brilliance. Don't miss the chance to witness this rising star live—grab your tickets now!
